name: Re-Dead
description:
Made for the Dumb game jam


You play as a Necromancer named Zeph when the "Hero" approaches your home, you decide to summon 20 zombies to take care of him, however, you added one too many zeroes, and summon 200 instead!  now your only choice is to hunt down all 200 of them before the Hero gets to you!

you'll have to learn some new types of magic, so you can turn those Undead into Redead
